images.alt: QUALITY STREET Celebration Tin, 180 grams. Assortment of caramels, crèmes, and chocolate pralines.

text: Introducing NESTLÉ Holiday Favourites! Celebrate the season with festive favourites - TURTLES indulgent combination of rich milk chocolate, smooth caramel, and crunchy pecans; beloved QUALITY STREET assorted sweets; and crunchy KITKAT milk chocolate Santas. These individually wrapped chocolates and sweets are perfect for your holiday gatherings, for sharing with family at home, or as stocking stuffers. Made with natural flavours, NESTLÉ Holiday favourites are made with 100% Rainforest Alliance certified cocoa, which helps farmers improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities. Ring in the holidays with NESTLÉ Holiday Favourites!
NESTLE Holiday Favourites Value BagFeatures and Benefits
Introducing NESTLÉ Holiday Favourites: A new waCelebrate: Ring in the holidays with NESTLÉ Holiday Favourites
Festive Favourites: Decadent Classic TURTLES caramel pecan pieces, beloved QUALITY STREET assorted sweets, and crunchy KITKAT milk chocolate Santas, all in one convenient bag
Perfect For Sharing: This 375g bag of individually wrapped holiday treats is ideal for sharing with family and friends at parties and gatherings
Natural Flavours: NESTLÉ Holiday Favourites are made with natural flavours

Rainforest Alliance Certified: As part of the NESTLÉ Cocoa Plan, NESTLÉ purchases 100% Rainforest Alliance certified cocoa which helps farmers improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities
Proudly Supporting Kids Help Phone: For more than 25 years NESTLÉ Canada has raised more than $10.2 million in support of Kids Help Phoney to celebrate the season with NESTLÉ
